text: Leucopenia and neutropenia were the most common grade 3-4 early toxicities and occurred in $1 8 .3 \%$ and $3 3 .3 \%$ of chemotherapy cycles respectively.No grade 3-4 late toxicities were reported.A meta-analysis1178 (seven studies541,1139,1140,1164,1179-1181) was identified but is not described due to major methodological limitations.
